comments: Equals partial sums of A002487 nonzero terms. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 03 2009
references: B. Reznick, Some binary partition functions, in "Analytic number theory" (Conf. in honor P. T. Bateman, Allerton Park, IL, 1989), 451-477, Progr. Math., 85, Birkhaeuser Boston, Boston, MA, 1990.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: Contribution from _Gary W. Adamson_, Mar 26 2010: (Start)Let r(x) = (1 + 2x + 2x^2 + 1). Then (1 + 2x + 4x^2 + 5x^3 + ...) =r(x) * r(x^2) * r(x^4) * r(x^8) * ... (End)
maple: b:= proc(n) option remember;      `if`(n<2, n, `if`(irem(n, 2)=0, b(n/2), b((n-1)/2) +b((n+1)/2)))    end:a:= proc(n) option remember;      b(n+1) +`if`(n>0, a(n-1), 0)    end:seq (a(n), n=0..70);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 21 2012
mathematica: b[n_] := b[n] = If[n<2, n, If[Mod[n, 2] == 0, b[n/2], b[(n-1)/2]+b[(n+1)/2]]]; a[n_] := a[n] = b[n+1] + If[n>0, a[n-1], 0]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 70}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 17 2014, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
